comments: The best professor in LACC. He doesn\'t waste time. Explains everything clearly, doesn\'t load you up with unnecessary information. Very funny , outgoing and just COOL!. I wish he would be our lecture professor. Take him you won\'t regret. I know I didn\'t.
Worst teacher ever he needs to be removed, is nor helpfull and goes through his lectures too fast and disregards students
Thee! Worst teacher! Discourages students and takes no responsibility for his own actions! Blows you off during office and/or he\'s not there.

Pros- He was always willing to help students during office hours. Gave extra credit by the end of the semester. I got an A in the class. Cons- very disorganized. OWLs are a pain in the rear. I didn\'t have him for lab, but I heard that his labs are tough. If you end up in his class, don\'t worry. It\'s doable.

You can tell he is passionate about chem, but that does not make him a good professor. He lectures VERY quickly. I thank OWL and youtube videos for getting me through this awful class. He is NOT helpful. Who gives a cumulative exam with no study guide? He sets you up to fail and lacks compassion for his students who are genuiney trying to learn.
This was the most horrible class i ever had. He is not just a bad teacher, he is awful. His accent thick, and hard to understand. Not helfull at all. If you have a chance take another teacher. Run)))

1000 points Total: 300p for 3 exams; 200p for cumulative final; 150p for 3 quizzes(total 4, wll DROP the lowest); 200p for online OWL HW; 150p for Lab. He\'s not that hard as others comment if U DO the lab and OWL, really. My 2nd test was 67, but I still got an A at the end

He is very knowledgable~~ The class wasn\'t so fun, cause he tought us in a fast pace... He has a sense of humor.! If you\'re interested in chemistry, take him!! I got an A~ without even using the textbook!! Do the online HW! It helped me a lot
OMG! your probably one of the slackers in the class. can tell from your writing. Good teacher, accent is OK. Take him if you wanna learn. Stay away if you wanna play.

OMG, do not take this teacher. Just horrible! He misses classes and than rush thru material. He is not fair, not organized. His tests so stupid!!! Seems like he is having fun to fail students. If you registred for the fall, drop right now. Do not wait!! Some teachers hard but teach you a lot, but not this one! Horrible accent, which is not helpfull
Worst Chem professor ever!! He moves fast and you do\'nt understand a single thing he says...really bad accent and not helpful.

Pros - short lectures, easy grader in lab, PowerPoint presentations available on-line, and generally a nice guy Cons - thick accent, impatient, passionless, tends to rush through material Good for motivated self-learners.Bad for true beginners.
There is a placement test for Chemistry just like Math and English. If you are "to smart" you may be placed in a higher Chemistry class.

First off, learn English. "TEST out of Chem 60" That makes no sense. And he teaches at more than one campus, and at my campus, he\'s teaching Chem 65. And btw, I have an A in the class. I rated him as easy if you check again. He is still not a great teacher. He\'s adequate at best, if you\'re a complete moron. You\'re probably one of his brown-nosers.

He is a great instructor. The student who made the comment below mine was obviously a slacker with a great imagination. If you feel you are smarter than him why didn\'t you TEST out of chem 60? I would recommend him to anyone who wants to learn. He teaches at a a level for everyone to understand.

HORRIBLE teacher. Has favorites, has moody days, disrespectful & insensitive. I CONSTANTLY had to correct his mistakes in class, and he obviously took great offense to it because I\'m smarter than him. Also, he has a thick accent, making him completely incomprehensible. I <3 Chem, but he made me hate it. DO NOT TAKE HIM (unless it\'s necessary)

His lecture is OK and he give us informations about EXAM. However, his writing is very unsightly also pronunciation. Native speakers can understand what he says, but I think if you are international students, you are hard to understanding.
Has thick accent but very smart and clear with lessons!
